name: Overtower
description:
Overtower is a rougelike platformer and endless game where player becomes an adventurer called Negi.  One famous legend among explorers tells that the spire in the east has a magical power that can grant a wish. Unfortunately, that tower is inhabited by monsters. Fight the monsters that get in your way and try to make your way to the top to become a true adventurer!  -Psst, who knows if there's a wish that could come true ;)- 

  • Controls:
    • Move  = Up & Down Arrow
    • Shoot = Space

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Designed and developed by MANGATSE TEAM as a Group Project submission of Game Development course.
